abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32673191, pmid32600909, pmid32662111, pmid32657566, pmid32669034, pmid32687168, pmid32672399, pmid32691856, pmid32686131, pmid32687636, pmid32680910, pmid32658925, pmid32692408, pmid32687609, pmid32681651, pmid32692894, pmid32668105, pmid32681121
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.23
